snippet.title: Ready, Steady, Ship! | Announcement Trailer (PC, PS4/5, Switch, Xbox)
snippet.description:
Grab a buddy and get this line moving double time! 
Ready, Steady, Ship! is coming to PC & Console!
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2225610/Ready_Steady_Ship/

Your job is simple - pick up the box and make sure it will get out of the factory in one piece. It can’t be that hard, RIGHT? 

Well you will be able to answer this question on your own once you will survive the conveyor belt chaos that’s waiting for you in Ready, Steady, Ship! 

P.S. No worries, You don’t have to be forklift certified.

JollyBits games
https://twitter.com/JollybitsGames

Untold Tales 
https://twitter.com/UntoldTalesHQ
https://www.facebook.com/untoldtalesgames
https://www.instagram.com/untoldtaleshq/
